content:
Complimentary lounge access worldwide with Mastercard Travel Pass.
Enjoy free access to some of the world’s best airport lounges every time you travel.
Travel in style with the Mastercard Travel App
Explore a selection of lounges across global Airport destinations and enjoy privileges, latest updates and much more on the app with your Emirates NBD Mastercard
Starting 1st May 2025 to continue enjoying the airport lounge benefit, you will need to be registered on the Mastercard Travel App
